name: Brisk Frames (PPG)
label: Bonus
description: For use on frames with less than 3 Speed. Equip to replace Speed value with 3.

name: Sensible Sensors (PPG)
label: Bonus
description: For use on frames with less than 5 Sensors. Equip to replace Sensors value with 5.

name: Faster (PPG)
label: Bonus
description: When forbidding actions from splitting up movement, increase the base Speed of all characters by 1.
